query: dialog with R's persona: persona: i play a lot of call of duty. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i drive a ford pinto. context:  R: i'm 4 . i do not have a car , mommy does . Q: thank you , i would like that ! my best friend lives in the house next door . R: i do ! i've to pick up my toys first , i don't do that enough . R: <extra_id_0>
answers: just wait until you start to drive a car !
generation: i like to play the insane clown posse. they're my favorite.

passages.title: Tyler goes to war
passages.text: I am a young man. I want to serve my country. I joins the army. While in the army I go to war. I lose my life in a war.

passages.title: Tune Up
passages.text: I and Liz were going to drive my car to Las Vegas. But I wanted to make sure the car would make it. My brother thought I should get a tune up. I took it to the local car place to have it done. I was very happy my brother had made the suggestion.

passages.title: Broken ankle
passages.text: I was walking to school. Since I wasn't looking at my feet, I stepped on a rock. I landed on the ground in pain. Thankfully, a stranger rushed to pick me up. He took me to the hospital to seek treatment.

passages.title: True Confession
passages.text: I entered the confessional and kneeled. I thought I was confessing to the old parish priest. I confessed I had fantasized about the young visiting priest. I felt relief as I left the confessional. Then I saw the old parish priest pull up in my car.

passages.title: Foolish Frank
passages.text: I had been drinking beer. I got a call from my girlfriend, asking where I was. I suddenly realized I had a date that night. Since I was already a bit drunk, I could not drive. I spent the rest of the night drinking more beers.

passages.title: Overweight Kid
passages.text: My parents were overweight. I was overweight as well. The doctors told my parents it was unhealthy. My parents understood and decided to make a change. They got themselves and I on a diet.
